thread.title: Mounties secure Mountain field hockey title
thread.title_full: Mounties secure Mountain field hockey title

title: Mounties secure Mountain field hockey title
text: Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 8:49 PM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 8:49 PM Â» Social News STROUDSBURG - Bridget Cunningham and Julianna Sweeney scored two goals each to lead Stroudsburg to a 5-0 win over PM East on Tuesday in Eastern Pennsylvania Conference field hockey. With the win, Stroudsburg is the EPC Mountain division champions. Stroudsburg 5, PM East 0 PM East 0 0 - 0 Stroudsburg 5 0 - 5 Goals - S, Bridget Cunningham 2, Julianna Sweeney 2, Joey Cimino. Assists - S, J. Sweeney, Kelsey Stewart, Sydney Cramer. Shots - PME 3, S 21. Corners - PME 1, S 18. Saves - PME Jess Hohenstein 15, S Morgan Dempsey 3. Records: Stroudsburg 16-1 (14-0 EPC), PM East 7-7-2. Pleasant Valley 4, ES North 0 BRODHEADSVILLE - Meara Hanyon scored a hat trick to lead Pleasant Valley to a 4-0 victory against ES North on Tuesday in EPC field hockey. Pleasant Valley 4, ES North 0 ES North 0 0 - 0 Pleasant Valley 3 1 - 4 Goals - PV, Meara Hanyon 3, Kallas Borden. Assists - PV, Jess Schnieder, Sarah Kaye. Shots - ESN 3, PV 24. Corners - ESN 5, PV 15. Records: Pleasant Valley 4-11, ES North 2-12. ES South 9, PM West 0 POCONO SUMMIT - Genni Martinelli scored two goals and had two assists for ES South in a 9-0 win over PM West on Tuesday in EPC field hockey. ES South 9, PM West 0 ES South 5 4 - 9 PM West 0 0 - 0 Goals - ESS, Lauren Munch 2, Taylor Gramberg 2, Genni Martinelli 2, Sabrina Sarni, Mikaela Hettel, Kelsey Picchianti. Assists - ESS, G. Martinelli 2, L. Munch, Madi Karjewski, K. Picchianti, S. Sarni, Lexis Girard-Cutaio. Shots - ESS 50, PMW 0. Corners - ESS 23, PMW 0. Girls Soccer PM East 3, Stroudsburg 2 STROUDSBURG - Megan DeHaven and Kayla Argen scored goals to lead PM East to a 3-2 victory over Stroudsburg on Monday in Eastern Pennsylvania Conference girls soccer. PM East 3, Stroudsburg 2 PM East 2 1 - 3 Stroudsburg 0 2 - 2 Goals - PME, Victoria Burkhart, Megan DeHaven, Kayla Argen. S, Emily Banashefski, Megan Horvat. Assists - S, Lexi Meisse. Shots - PME 10, S 8. Corners - PME 4, S 0. Saves - PME Allison Bone 6, S Kendall White 7. Records: PM East 11-3-1, Stroudsburg 10-6-1. PM West 5, ES South 1 POCONO SUMMIT - Kathrynn Gonzalez and Maygen Fred both scored twice to lead PM West to a 5-1 win over ES South in EPC girls soccer Tuesday. PM West 5, ES South 1 ES South 0 1 - 1 PM West 2 3 - 5 Goals - ESS, Karla Montes. PMW, Kathrynn Gonzalez 2, Maygen Fred 2, Nicole Brigante. Assists - ESS, Kristen Marsh. PMW, K. Gonzalez, N. Brigante, Rebecca Lotito, C. Kelly. Shots - ESS 2, PMW 13. Corners - ESS 2, PMW 4. Saves - ESS Gabby Bonnar 7, PMW Kimberly Alejo 1. Other Scores Boys Soccer PM West 4, ES South 2 EAST STROUDSBURG - Tim Gaudette scored two goals and Payton Batt made nine saves in net to lead PM West to a 4-2 win over ES South in Eastern Pennsylvania Conference boys soccer Tuesday. PM West 4, ES South 2 PM West 2 2 - 4 ES South 1 1 - 2 Goals - PMW, Tim Gaudette 2, John Tambasco, Owen Orlowski. ESS, Daryl Longdon 2. Assists - PMW, J. Tambasco 2, T. Gaudette, Matt Azzarelli. Shots - PMW 12, ESS 10. Corners - PMW 8, ESS 4. Saves - PMW Payton Batt 9, ESS John Bergoffen 8. Records: PM West 3-13-1 (3-12 EPC), ES South 3-13-1 (2-12-1 EPC). Baseball ES Mustangs 10, Tamaqua 9 EAST STROUDSBURG - Matthew Williams had a game-winning triple in the seventh inning for the ES Mustangs in a 10-9 win over Tamaqua in fall league baseball. The Mustangs scored seven runs in the bottom of the seventh to win the game. ES Mustangs 10, Tamaqua 9 Tamaqua 303 010 2 - 9 8 2 Mustangs 000 030 7 - 10 7 1 WP - Laureano, LP - Gerra.
